attributes.value: Values family

Disregards tradition

Considers craftsmanship to be relatively worthless

Is quite polite
Accepts favors without developing a sense of obligation, preferring to act as the current situation demands

Always acts with mercy and compassion at the forefront of her considerations
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life

Absolutely inexhaustible
